I'm hyped for the future! We're on the brink of abundance if we dodge all-out war. Bitcoin's the key in my opinion. A protocol that is promoting trade over torture, peace over warmongers' profits, and people over politicians sacrificing lives for wealth. The future's bright for those who stack sats and build it!

6/7/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
